description: Redevelopment (with the exception of 18 Gaskin Street) to provide 84 residential units (27 one bedroom, 47 two bedroom 10 three bedroom) and a health club, restaurant and shops along with associated parking and landscaping. Applicants plan nos: 2810 P01,P02E,P03C,P04E,P05E,P06E,P07H, P08F,P09D,P10D,P11D,P12D,P13D,P14,P15.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of five years from the date of this permission. 

 REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
